metadata.synopsis: The players use a boat to reach the duergar camp. In the middle of the lake, they are confronted by a group of duergar on a raft. Being Drow/Duergar changes the tone of the conversation and makes the persuasion event easier. Having the mark of the Absolute can also make the persuasion event easier.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to X:0 , Y:-205 (goto 0, -205)Click on boat at dockWill play after departing cinematic

15.speaker: Corsair Greymon
15.text: You there! Drow! Why are you in Gekh's raft?
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player touches their head briefly, but there is no mind meld.

17.speaker: Corsair Greymon
17.text: We aren't expecting more of you. Where's Gekh? Who are you?

35.speaker: Corsair Greymon
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player touches their head briefly, but there is no mind meld.

32.speaker: Corsair Greymon
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player touches their head briefly, but there is no mind meld.

119.speaker: Player
119.text: I saw a body left by the myconids - your 'Gekh' must be dead.
119.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player touches their head briefly, but there is no mind meld.

67.speaker: Corsair Greymon
67.text: Damn it. Gekh's gone and screwed up. If he's dead, so's the squad.

36.speaker: Corsair Greymon
36.text: Damn it. Gekh's gone and screwed up. If he's dead, so's the squad.

86.speaker: Corsair Greymon
86.text: Move over - I'll take you to shore. You're the one telling the sergeant what happened.

75.text: The rest of you - keep patrolling. I'm heading back with the drow.

80.speaker: Corsair Greymon
80.text: You lot - keep patrollin'. I'm headin' back with this one.

135.speaker: Corsair Greymon
135.text: The whole squad? Damn it. Gekh's gone and screwed up. Nere'll lose his head over this.

19.text: What a load of rothé shite. No way a mushroom killed Gekh.

127.speaker: Corsair Greymon
127.text: What a load of rothé shite. No way a mushroom killed Gekh.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: I'm afraid Gekh is dead - he fell fighting the myconids.
121.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player touches their head briefly, but there is no mind meld.

110.speaker: Player
110.text: Just let me cross - I have the brand, see?
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player touches their head briefly, but there is no mind meld.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Reach out to the duergar's parasite.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player touches their head briefly, but there is no mind meld.

53.speaker: Narrator
53.text: *Your parasite stirs briefly, then goes still. The duergar is not infected.*
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player touches their head briefly, but there is no mind meld.

95.speaker: Corsair Greymon
95.text: Hold up, boys. We got a deep gnome here - and rowing Gekh's raft, no less.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Another raft approaches. The Duergar on board pilot it next ot the player's craft. Novice Greymond stands opposite the player, the tiny gap between the boats seperating them.

1.speaker: Corsair Greymon
1.text: You got guts floating out here like this. Where's Gekh? Who are you?

98.speaker: Corsair Greymon
98.text: You! What are you doing on Gekh's raft?
98.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Another raft approaches. The Duergar on board pilot it next ot the player's craft. Novice Greymond stands opposite the player, the tiny gap between the boats seperating them.

41.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Another raft approaches. The Duergar on board pilot it next ot the player's craft. Novice Greymond stands opposite the player, the tiny gap between the boats seperating them.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: I work on Gekh's behalf. I'm after his sergeant's stolen boots.

29.speaker: Corsair Greymon
29.text: Ho! How desperate is the cur, to make an ally of a topsider?

103.speaker: Corsair Greymon
103.text: I will tell you now what the sergeant told Gekh: until you have the boots, you will not cross.

13.speaker: Corsair Greymon
13.text: Come back empty-handed again, and you're feeding the fishes.

116.speaker: Player
116.text: Boat back to the grotto shore.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Push the duergar into the water.
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Player pushes Graymon into the water

65.speaker: Corsair Greymon
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Player pushes Graymon into the water

44.speaker: Corsair Greymon
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Player pushes Graymon into the water

131.speaker: Player
131.text: Raise your weapon. I mean to pass now!

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I seek the sergeant - I believe she's keen to get these boots back.

42.speaker: Corsair Greymon
42.text: Well I'll be - you got them. The sergeant's been whining non-stop.

105.speaker: Corsair Greymon
105.text: What about Gekh? Where's he at?

33.speaker: Player
33.text: He stayed behind to tie up some loose ends.

58.speaker: Corsair Greymon
58.text: But he let you go, eh? Suppose he figured the sergeant could sort you out.

8.speaker: Corsair Greymon
8.text: More like avoiding the sergeant, I reckon.

2.speaker: Corsair Greymon
2.text: Come on - let's get you to shore. You're the one telling the sergeant what happened.

72.text: The rest of you - keep patrolling. I'll be heading back with the drow.

62.speaker: Corsair Greymon
62.text: The rest of you - keep patrolling. I'll be heading back with this one.

120.speaker: Narrator
120.text: *You continue forward in silence until the lights of a camp twinkle through the murk.*

108.speaker: Player
108.text: He's dead. The myconids saw to that.

74.speaker: Corsair Greymon
74.text: You don't know Gekh? How'd you... ugh, whatever - I don't care.

107.speaker: Player
107.text: The shite-brain's off shirking his duties somewhere.

12.speaker: Corsair Greymon
12.text: Avoiding the sergeant, is he? Can't blame him. She mentioned something 'bout biting his toes off.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: MOVE YOUR BOAT, OR SINK. MAKE THE CHOICE.

43.text: All right, all right. No reason to get your horns in a twist.

81.speaker: Corsair Greymon
81.text: All right, all right. No reason to get your tongue in a twist.

97.speaker: Player
97.text: In the name of the Absolute - you will let me pass.

38.text: The Absolute? Not bloody likely. Get him, fellas!

52.speaker: Corsair Greymon
52.text: The Absolute? Not bloody likely. Get them, fellas!

136.speaker: Player
136.text: I saw a body left by the myconids - your 'Gekh' must be dead.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: I'm afraid Gekh is dead - he fell fighting the myconids.

54.speaker: Corsair Greymon
54.text: Damn - the sergeant'll be pissed 'bout her boots.

22.speaker: Corsair Greymon
22.text: Damn - the sergeant'll be pissed 'bout her boots.

134.text: What a load of rothé shite. No way a mushroom killed Gekh.

34.speaker: Corsair Greymon
34.text: What a load of rothé shite. No way a mushroom killed Gekh.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Just let me cross - I have the brand, see?

47.speaker: Corsair Greymon
47.text: All right, all right. No reason to get your horns in a twist.

76.speaker: Corsair Greymon
76.text: All right, all right. No reason to get your tongue in a twist.

4.speaker: Corsair Greymon
4.text: Well, come on. Let's get you to shore. You'll need to report to the sergeant.

137.text: I don't care what you've got scrawled on your skin. I don't like your face.

70.speaker: Corsair Greymon
70.text: I don't care what you've got scrawled on your skin. I don't like your face.

102.speaker: Corsair Greymon
102.text: Godsdamned dwarf. What are you doing on Gekh's raft?
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from his boat to the player's boat at end of line.NodeContext: Should sound quite ominous.

26.speaker: Corsair Greymon
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from his boat to the player's boat at end of line.NodeContext: Should sound quite ominous.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Duergar, like you? Saw his body a way back. Myconids got him.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from his boat to the player's boat at end of line.NodeContext: Should sound quite ominous.

49.speaker: Corsair Greymon
49.text: Damn it. The sergeant'll be pissed about her boots.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from his boat to the player's boat at end of line.NodeContext: Should sound quite ominous.

56.speaker: Corsair Greymon
56.text: Damn it. The sergeant'll be pissed about her boots.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from his boat to the player's boat at end of line.NodeContext: Should sound quite ominous.

106.speaker: Corsair Greymon
106.text: Come on, hoon. You're coming with me. I won't be the one to tell the sergeant what happened.
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from his boat to the player's boat at end of line.NodeContext: Should sound quite ominous.

51.speaker: Corsair Greymon
51.text: She just loves your sort, you see. Real keen on deep gnomes. Heh.
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Moves from his boat to the player's boat at end of line.NodeContext: Should sound quite ominous.

109.text: The rest of you - keep patrolling. I'll head back with this one.

20.speaker: Corsair Greymon
20.text: The rest of you - keep patrolling. I'll head back with this one.

113.text: What a load of rothé shite. No way a mushroom killed Gekh.

90.speaker: Corsair Greymon
90.text: What a load of rothé shite. No way a mushroom killed Gekh.

129.speaker: Player
129.text: I'm afraid Gekh is dead. He fell fighting the myconids.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: See this brand? Let me pass.

111.speaker: Corsair Greymon
111.text: I don't care what you've got scrawled on your skin. I don't like your face.

73.text: I don't care what you've got scrawled on your skin. I don't like your face.

16.speaker: Corsair Greymon
16.text: I don't care what you've got scrawled on your skin. I don't like your face.

125.speaker: Corsair Greymon
125.text: You again? Show me the boots, or face the Absolute's judgement.

25.speaker: Corsair Greymon
25.text: Did I not warn you? Slice 'em up, fellas!

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Here they are, safe and sound.
